org_midgardproject_projectsite_download.title: Ubuntu
org_midgardproject_projectsite_download.content: <div><p>On <b>Ubuntu Lucid (10.04 LTS)</b>, run the following command:</p></div><div><pre>$ sudo add-apt-repository "deb http://download.opensuse.org/repositories/home:/midgardproject:/ratatoskr/xUbuntu_10.04/ ./"</pre></div><div><p>Then run <i>apt-get update</i> and <i>apt-get install libmidgard2-2010</i>. To use Midgard2 with <a href="http://live.gnome.org/GObjectIntrospection/Users">GObject Introspection</a> in any language, install the library with <i>apt-get install gir1.0-midgard2</i>. For PHP, install the extension via apt-get install <i>php5-midgard2</i>.</p></div><div><p>On <b>Ubuntu Natty (11.04)</b> Midgard2 <a href="http://packages.ubuntu.com/search?keywords=midgard&amp;searchon=names&amp;suite=natty&amp;section=all">is available</a> in the repositories. Simply run:</p><pre>$ sudo apt-get install libmidgard2</pre></div><div><p>To use Midgard2 with <a href="http://live.gnome.org/GObjectIntrospection/Users">GObject Introspection</a> in any language, install the library with <i>apt-get install gir1.2-midgard2</i>.</p></div>
